mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM orders WHERE DATE(order_time) = #{date}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM orders WHERE DATE(order_time) = #{date} AND status = 5

SELECT od.name AS name, SUM(od.number) AS number FROM order_detail od JOIN orders o ON od.order_id = o.id WHERE o.status = 5 /* 已完成的订单 */ AND o.order_time >= #{begin} AND o.order_time <= #{end} GROUP BY od.name ORDER BY number DESC LIMIT 10
